query: query ProductComposite($id: ID!, $limit: Int = 3) { product(id: $id){ id name price stock lowStock category description } recommendations(id: $id, limit: $limit){ id name price stock lowStock } topSellers: products(limit: 5){ id name price stock lowStock } accessories: products(limit: 3, category: "accessories"){ id name price stock lowStock category } }
